string.value: Apparently, the #bThe Rememberer#k of Sleepywood is conducting studies on mutated Horny Mushrooms. You should go to Sleepywood to find out more.

Some Horny Mushrooms have been acting really mean lately, and there seems to be something suspicious going on. #bThe Rememberer#k has noticed the change and is conducting studies on these supicious Horny Mushrooms.\r\n
You helped #bThe Rememberer#k with his research on Horny Mushrooms, but he seems to need some more information.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 7,000\r\nCan proceed to 'Raging Horny Mushrooms' quest\r\n

Have you seen the Horny Mushrooms lately? They seem to be much more enraged than usual. From what I hear, something happened at the Mushroom Castle. I plan on conducting a thorough research on the Horny Mushrooms. Can you help me with it?
Thank you. I'll need 30 Horny Mushroom Caps to start things off. Can you get me those?
This is just the tip of the iceberg. There's no way to tell what's going to happen nextâ€¦
Thank you. These will help me with my research. Please wait for me for a bit, okay?
